column4: I am upgrading to breezy from hoary but not all the packages have been downloaded. Is it wise to installed the already downloaded packages myself?
I running out of space :(
the pkgs will come when they are ready
k3b
is that a kde app
yes it is. and it is most likely the best cd/dvd burning tool we have available
my serpentine segfaults every time i start it
how do you escape out of xkill
you dont. click on your panel
so you must kill something...hmm.. by the way I killed my panel and gaim died with it
it'll come back, unless you clicked on the gaim button
nope it kill gaim again
what are you trying to kill?
i clearly clicked the panel only
I was just testing it out. I sawthat you guys were just talking about..
put a blank disk in the drive
is that the only way to launch it
it's the only way i've found  (i use k3b to burn disks)
ok
the nautilus cd burner is very very simple
too simple sometimes
it should, if you're running an x86 arch
ok :(

i got sound to work flash in firefox, but not epiphany browser,, I went using the guide at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats. Any suggestions on what i need to do to get it runniing on epiphany?
did you put your flash plugin in ~/.mozilla/plugins or /usr/lib/mozilla/plugins/  ?
libflash-mozplugin.so yes
yes libflashplayer.so
in your mozilla dir, not firefox dirs?
/usr/lib/mozilla/plugins. that's where i am
then epiphany should be using them
it doesnt seem to be....well it runs the video part of the flash....but not the sound part
it only worked for firefox when I did this... A different try: create ~/.mozilla/firefox/rc with the line FIREFOX_DSP="none".
ah! that's another problem, that i havent seen a solution to
off topic. why are you using epiphany and not galeon?
cause...cause......I dont know...options :)
galeon (imho) is a better gecko client than epiphany
ok. but... i think galeon will have the same problem as epiphany

kestas ahh  just as I thought. at  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats tells you you can trying add the FIREFOX_DSP="none" line to ~/.mozilla/firefox/rc file. When I comment it out...it doesnt work, when i uncomment it works...
kestas now my guess is that I need to enter an entry for epiphany and gaelon too.... Any ideas how that would look?
~/.epiphany/blah?
thanks...but i mean....the entry in the RC file..what would that look like....EPIPHANY_DSP?
perhaps put "epiphany_dsp" into google and see what comes up
did that already,,,nothing
well galeon has the same problem...
it has something to do with DSP being off when firefox runs......
i dont run flash things (even on my OSX, where it actually works)
ubuntu is rife with sound problems
ok tell me this...the rc file. what does rc mean?
i've not figured that out yet, which is crazy seein how long i've been using *nix
that's ok....I understand
if you find out, let me know, please
ok
adding EPIPHANY_DSP to the rc file doesnt seem to work?
do you know how I can kill dsp manually?
hunt it down using ps aux
I dont see it running 'dsp'
/msg ubotu sound
why do you like gaelon again?
more features and gtk2 (imho)
it'll get better. sound has always been an issue in ubuntu
always.....mann....I hope that changes pretty soon
anyways...I am way pass my bed time. thanks for the advice,, later
sleep well
thanks for the info
ubotu was knocked offline during the flood attack earlier
oh ok
apt-cache search clipboard
the search said that I have xclipboard installed
i dont think that;s what I need though
hey
for example.. I want to search for... the work infront. in irrsi
why are you issuing nuke orders for /var/ ?
oh... not the /var/ folder but the file.. that he was talking about
when you are using those commands, please be very specific
your right.. i should thanks
from what Flannel and gnomefreak were saying update-manager -d should upgrade to Edgy..if it is out..
ubotu suggests that when you message upgrade to him.. that can be dangerous or not what people want.
can you change it
i know nothing about upgrade-mangler
PM ubotu the changes you want
pm ubotu the changes I want? not sure I understand you
you've gotten two messages
what you talking about?
you around.. I could use some of your wisdom right now?
there is plenty of wisdom in this channel
see.. wise stuff like that i nee
what did you need?
windows fix?
i don't understand
trying to build compiz from source. on doing that compiz says it depends on libstartup-notification-1.0. the latest release (I checked) is 0.8. So it seems that some script is wrong.
how does one, like me, get around that
file a bug
